schema.title: Auction Embeddable
schema.description: Publishing configurations to publish the ADO as an App

auction.title: Auction Address
auction.description: The address of the Auction ADO you wish to display on your Embeddable.

cw721.title: CW721 Address
cw721.description: The address of the CW721 ADO that minted the CW721 Token you wish to display on your Embeddable

twitter.title: Twitter URL
twitter.description: Your twitter handle. Must begin with https://.

featured.title: Featured Token Id
featured.description: The Token ID of the specific CW721 Token you wish to display on your Embeddable.
